title: Bug 32770 - Improving Error Message for Java Application Launch
description: This bug report highlights an issue with the error message that is displayed during a Java application launch. The report suggests improving the quality of the error message to make it more helpful for users.
OB: The bug report lacks specific information about the observed behavior.
EB: The expected behavior is to enhance the quality of the error message to provide users with more informative and actionable guidance when encountering errors during Java application launches.
SR:
To replicate the issue:
1. Open a Java file that contains a main method.
2. Select a non-resource-based view, such as the Debug view.
3. Click on 'Debug As' and choose 'Java Application' from the options.
